questions.question: how many presantation options
questions.answer:
In the document, it is mentioned that Prezi offers three types of animations for presentations:
1. Camera movements between slides.
2. Zoom effects to highlight details or take a bird's eye view.
3. The appearance of objects or content on click, similar to PowerPoint.

If you want to learn more about Prezi presentation options, you can visit this link: https://moodle.hm.edu/course/view.php?id=20194#coursecontentcollapse2

What other information would you like to know about presentations?
